summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2699, for the improvement of 42nd Avenue South from Ferdinand Street on the east to Ferdinand Street on the west; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete walk thereon, and by planking and resurfacing the same, under Ordinance No. 31709 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
